member.name: T:Msile.Constants
member.summary: Holds common constants.
member.remarks: Warnings about the naming of the constants in this class can be safely suppressed if they pertain to the Windows API. For FxCop code analysis, right-click and "suppress message" in the "project suppression file" (GlobalSuppressions.cs). For StyleCop, the SuppressMessage attribute will take care of it.

member.name: F:Msile.Constants.WS_EX_COMPOSITED
member.summary: With this style turned on for your form, Windows does double-buffering on the form and all its child controls.

member.name: T:Msile.Helpers
member.summary: This class contains helpers.
member.remarks: It is not good to have a lot of helpers. As soon as there are some helpers with related functionality, it is desireable to move them to a dedicated class.

member.name: M:Msile.Helpers.ThrowExceptionIfNull``1(``0)
member.summary: Checks if a generic object is null, throws an exception if it is, and returns it if it's not.
member.remarks: This is useful to bypass CA1062 in cases where you know it's not null, such as overriden control event handlers.
member.returns: The unaltered input, if not null.
